titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that funding should be made available from the Highway Trust Fund to encourage States to require law enforcement officers to impound motor vehicles of those charged with driving while intoxicated and to issue responsibility warnings to those who take custody of suspects of driving while intoxicated.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 7/26/2002--Introduced. Urges funding be made available from the Highway Trust Fund to encourage States to require law enforcement officers to: (1) impound motor vehicles of individuals charged with operating a motor vehicle while intoxicated; and (2) issue responsibility warnings to individuals who take custody of suspects of driving while intoxicated.
